tasks.label: Container Configuration
tasks.command: docker container stop $(docker ps -a -q) ; docker container rm $(docker ps -a -q) ; docker compose up -d; docker cp BUILD/BIN/ICE-SERVICE ice-server-container-v2:/data/ICE2/ICE-SERVICE ; docker exec -d -w /data/ICE2/WebInterface ice-server-container-v2 /usr/bin/nodejs javascripts/Main_API.js javascripts/config.json ; IPS=$(docker exec -it ice-server-container-v2 cat "/data/ICE2/CONFIG/KinetConfiguration.xml" | xmlstarlet sel -t -v "//configuration/panel/@ip"); for ip in $IPS; do docker run --detach --label panel --label qsdf --net auditorium --ip "$ip" gitlab.cgrcinemas.fr:5050/martin.lagrange/iceauditoriumsimulator /IceDeviceEmulator "$ip" 192.50.0.1 ; done

tasks.label: Container Stop
tasks.command: docker container stop ice-server-container-v2 ice-panel-container-v2 ice-server-container-central-v2;

tasks.label: Container Config Web-Central
tasks.command: docker cp BUILD/BIN/ICE-CENTRAL ice-server-container-central-v2:/data/ICE2/ICE-CENTRAL ; docker cp EXE/SERVICES/WebCentral ice-server-container-central-v2:/data/ICE2/ ;

tasks.label: Start ICE-SERVICE and ICE-Panel
tasks.command: docker exec -d ice-panel-container-v2 /IceDeviceEmulator 192.50.50.3 192.50.0.1; docker exec -d ice-server-container-v2 /data/ICE2/ICE-SERVICE configPath:/data/ICE2/CONFIG/; docker exec -d -w /data/ICE2/WebInterface ice-server-container-v2 /usr/bin/nodejs javascripts/Main_API.js javascripts/config.json

tasks.label: Container-Image Remove
tasks.command: docker container stop ice-server-container-v2 ice-panel-container-v2 ice-server-container-central-v2; docker container rm ice-server-container-v2 ice-panel-container-v2 ice-server-container-central-v2; docker rmi -f ice_v2-ice-server-central-v2 ice_v2-ice-server-v2 gitlab.cgrcinemas.fr:5050/martin.lagrange/icedeviceemulator;

tasks.label: Docker container build and run
tasks.command: docker build -t ice-server-v2 . ; docker build -t ice-server-central-v2 -f dockerfileCentral . ; docker compose up -d ;

tasks.label: Restart Container & Start ICE-Central & NodeJS Central
tasks.command: docker restart ice-server-container-central-v2; docker cp EXE/SERVICES/WebCentral ice-server-container-central-v2:/data/ICE2/ ; docker exec -d ice-server-container-central-v2 /data/ICE2/ICE-CENTRAL; docker exec -d -w /data/ICE2/WebCentral ice-server-container-central-v2 /usr/bin/nodejs --inspect=0.0.0.0:9229 javascripts/Main_API.js javascripts/config.json;
